UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Functional Analyses of Three Targeted DNA Antimicrobial Peptides Derived from Goats.
Literature.Author: Wang A, Zhou M, Chen Q, Jin HZ, Xu G, Guo R, Wang J, Lai R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CMCC 44102(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCC 10104(MIC=75µg/ml),Shigella flexneri ATCC 12022(MIC=75µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26003(MIC=18.75µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>100µg/ml),Clostridium perfringens ATCC 13124(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans CMCC 98001(MIC=>100µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(30-40% Cytotoxicity=200µg/ml),Mouse breast cancer 4T1(20-30% Cytotoxicity=200µg/ml)
